original_text: “Now when David had served God’s purpose in his own generation, he fell asleep; he was buried with his ancestors and his body decayed.
korean_text: 다윗은 당시에 하나님의 뜻을 따라 섬기다가 잠들어 그 조상들과 함께 묻혀 썩음을 당하였으되

sentences.original_text: Now when David had served God's purpose
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 다윗이 하나님의 목적을 섬겼을 때

sentences.original_text: he was buried with his ancestors
